moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
